.gitignore:
# Compiled Lua
*.luac

# LuaRocks
luarocks/
*.rock

# IDE
.vscode/

*.swp

*~

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
main.lua:
-- Load modules
local data = require('data.data')
local tool = require('tool.tool')

print('Hello, World!')

local dataInstance = data.new()
local toolInstance = tool.new()
data/data.lua:
local Data = {}
Data.__index = Data

function Data.new()
    local self = setmetatable({}, Data)
    return self
end

return Data
tool/tool.lua:
local Tool = {}
Tool.__index = Tool

function Tool.new()
    local self = setmetatable({}, Tool)
    return self
end

return Tool
